equip_suit.name: Chaotic Metal
equip_suit.desc2: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers <color=#FE437E>Corruption's</color> additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

equip_suit.name: Chaotic Metal
equip_suit.desc2: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers <color=#FE437E>Corruption's</color> additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

equip_suit.name: Chaotic Metal
equip_suit.desc2: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers <color=#FE437E>Corruption's</color> additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

equip_suit.name: Woodpecker Electro
equip_suit.desc2: Landing a critical hit on an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.

equip_suit.name: Woodpecker Electro
equip_suit.desc2: Landing a critical hit on an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.

equip_suit.name: Chaotic Metal
equip_suit.desc2: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers <color=#FE437E>Corruption's</color> additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

weapon.name: The Brimstone
weapon.talent_content: Upon hitting an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, the equipper's ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>3.5%</color> for 8s, stacking up to 8 times. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

items.title: Basic Attack: Don't Move!
items.text:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Assault Mode]</color>
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate.
Unleash a flurry of martial arts, bullets, and Ether Buckshots in a series of up to 5 attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
When the 4th or 5th hit strikes an enemy, obtain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> per hit. A max of 1 can be obtained per activation of this Basic Attack.
While using this skill, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive</color> and readjust to face the selected direction.
While under <color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to switch to <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>.

items.title: Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist
items.text:
<color=#FFFFFF>[Suppressive Mode]</color>
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleash up to 3 Shotshell piercing attacks, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. If Zhu Yuan has <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> upon firing, 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> will be consumed, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
While using this skill, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to activate her <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> and readjust to face the selected direction.
While in <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to return to <color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>.

items.title: Special Attack: Buckshot Blast
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:\nShoots Ether Buckshots that deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>. This can be repeated 3 times by repeatedly pressing <IconMap:Icon_Special>.\nAnti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

items.title: EX Special Attack: Full Barrage
items.text:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Shoots a series of Ether Buckshots, that explode and deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Dodge: Tactical Detour
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:\nA quick dash dodge.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive
items.text: <color=#FFFFFF>Assault Mode</color>\nPress <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:\nUses handgun to attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.

items.title: Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower
items.text: <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>\nDrag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} during <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> to activate:\nUnleashes a Shotshell piercing attack, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>. If Zhu Yuan has <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> when firing, 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> will be consumed, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.

items.title: Dodge Counter: Fire Blast
items.text:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate.
Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> on skill use.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Chain Attack: Eradication Mode
items.text:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Ultimate: Max Eradication Mode
items.text:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Core Passive: Special Ops Ammunition
items.text: When Zhu Yuan is under <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, using <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color> increases her DMG by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this DMG buff is increased by an additional <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>. When Zhu Yuan enters the battlefield, she immediately gains 6 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.

items.title: Additional Ability: Tactical Coordination
items.text: When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:\nZhu Yuan's CRIT Rate is increased by 30% for 10s after using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>.

items.title: Quick Assist: Covering Shot
items.text:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate.
Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshell</color> on skill use.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Evasive Assist: Guarded Backup
items.text: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:\nDodges the enemy's attack and activates <color=#FFFFFF>Vital View</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Assist Follow-Up: Defensive Counter
items.text:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after an <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color> to activate:
Attack with a combination of martial arts and shotshells, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.
Upon activation, gain 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ranks.name: Quick Reload
ranks.desc: When Zhu Yuan activates a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>/<color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect.\nWhen Zhu Yuan has the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect and uses up all <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Reload</color> effect will be consumed to instantly gain 6/9 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>.

ranks.name: Ether Ember
ranks.desc: In <color=#FFFFFF>Suppressive Mode</color>, Zhu Yuan's Anti-Interrupt level is increased and DMG taken reduced by 10%.\nWhen Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, the target takes 10% more <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color>, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 5s.\nEach shot adds one stack of this effect, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

ranks.name: Ether Perforation
ranks.desc: When Zhu Yuan hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower</color> ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FE437E>Ether RES</color>.

ranks.name: Expanded Energy Pack III
ranks.desc: When Zhu Yuan consumes a total of 12 <color=#FFFFFF>Enhanced Shotshells</color>, she receives the <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> effect, and the Energy cost of the next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is reduced by 30.\nLaunching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> will consume <color=#FFFFFF>Ether Afterglow</color> and shoot an additional 4-bullet Ether Buckshot.\nEach extra bullet deals DMG equal to 220% of Zhu Yuan's ATK.
